name: poison-touch

effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit. This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust. This ability takes effect before mummy.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit. This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust. This ability takes effect before mummy.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit. This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust. This ability takes effect before mummy.

short_effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.

flavor_text.sun-moon: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
